features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: The nemesis has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the nemesis's allies is within 2m of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

features.name: Self-Destruct
features.description: When the nemesis dies, it explodes. Each creature within 4m of it must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

features.name: Shadow Cloak
features.description: While in dim light or darkness, the nemesis can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

features.name: Surprise Attack
features.description: If the nemesis surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra [dmg] damage from the attack.
